tasks.task: Planting onion sets in a no-dig bed and a hugelkultur bed.
subtasks: Preparing to plant the onion sets on October 5th.
Choosing the Shakespeare and Sensue yellow onion varieties.
Planting the onion sets at a depth of 5cm.
Planting in a no-digbed method without tilling the soil.
Layering compost and organic materials on the existing ground for the no-dig bed.
Creating a mound for the hugelkultur bed using decaying wood, branches, and organic matter.
Ensuring the bed retains moisture and releases nutrients as the wood decomposes.
Watering in the onion sets if needed, but leaving it as is due to wet ground.
Monitoring the growth and comparing the results of the two methods.
Publishing updates and engaging with viewers on social media.
